title: Eichhorn in his Homers Odyssee. Ein Fiihrer durch die Dichtung (Gottingen, 1965) also divides up the Odyssey into six parts which coincide with four books in each case, except for his division between the third and the fourth part at 13.92 (cf. my note 15 below). I do not agree with Eichhorn's division of each of the six parts into three sub-groups; the grouping into the traditional four 'books' seems more adequate to me
